column1: This is the America that I know and love. https://t.co/MeIyRxAsmb
From my family to yours have a wonderful Thanksgiving!  What are you thankful for? https://t.co/A1FqpXlY62
And I’m thankful that we live in the greatest freest nation on earth. Where God is still in control no matter who is President.

I’m thankful for the great state of Tennessee and the people of my district who elected me to represent them in the United States Congress.   I’m thankful for President Donald Trump who has led this country to great prosperity over the last four years.

Gratitude: I’m thankful to be surrounded by the ones that I love this week.   I'm thankful for our heroes in uniform who defend this country and protect our communities. And I'm thankful to our teachers and our healthcare workers.
I hope you can find some joy in this difficult time. Even in a year like 2020 we should remember all that we have to be thankful for.   May God bless you this holiday season.
This year has not been what we thought it would be. I don’t think any of us would argue that. But you could say that that gives us all the more reason to be thankful this Thanksgiving season.
